name: Player
text: Hello, can I order my favourite butter chicken?

name: al' Pachino
text: No... We don't have butter chicken no more

name: al' Pachino
text: Seems like there are no chickens left in this valley(

name: Player
text: F*CK NO. Is there any place where I can get the BUTTER CHICKEN?

name: al' Pachino
text: Yes, there is one, but it's faaaar away from here.

name: Player
text: Where? Tell me. I'll get there.

name: al' Pachino
text: HAHAHA. You fool. You ain't worthy!

name: al' Pachino
text: Your butter chicken will be waiting for you in the end. Good luck
